metadata.synopsis: The player made the choice to become a Mind Flayer, but held off on transforming right away, so the Emperor gave them a supreme tadpole to use when they decided to make the switch.Using the supreme tadpole item will trigger this dialog, which can happen in and out of combat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe end_supremetadpoleuse the supreme tadpoleThree different context:Out of CombatIn CombatOn the Netherbrain (oe brainbattle)

0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player retrieves the supreme tadpole from their inventory. The tadpole levitates in their palm.

69.speaker: Narrator
69.text: *A fierce thing, burning with potential, primed for absorption - it feels the pull of the Netherbrain, but its attention rests on you.*

46.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
46.text: Remember - you have to be illithid to wield the Netherstones. Now is the time. Absorb the parasite's potential. Evolve.

2.speaker: Orpheus
2.text: Now is the moment - make the sacrifice. Become ghaik, and wield the stones!

22.speaker: Karlach
22.text: Wait. There's another way. You know what's waiting for me - nothing but oblivion. This could be my last good deed.

38.speaker: Karlach
38.text: Let me do this for you. For me. Please, darling. I want to.

58.speaker: Karlach
58.text: Wait. You don't have to do this. There's another option - me.

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: I'm dying. My heart feels like a live grenade - gonna blow any minute. You still have a life to live. I don't.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: This is my sacrifice to make. Not yours.

35.speaker: Karlach
35.text: But it isn't a sacrifice. Not to me. I... I'm dying. This thing in my chest is burning me through.

33.speaker: Karlach
33.text: You always were sensible. This heart inside me is about to blow. Doesn't matter which body it obliterates, right?

27.speaker: Karlach
27.text: If this is the end for me, let me be the motherfucker who saved the world.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: All right. If this is what you really want, all I can say is thank you.

56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach closes their eyes, a mindmeld effect takes over. Karlach transforms into a mind flayer. See: END_IllithidOptions_Assimilation for animation of the same moment.

59.speaker: Karlach
59.text: You'll still love me when I've got a face full of tentacles, right?

30.speaker: Karlach
30.text: You'll still go drinking with me when I've got a face full of tentacles, right?

67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach closes their eyes, a mindmeld effect takes over. Karlach transforms into a mind flayer.

18.speaker: Karlach
18.text: Well would you look at that. If I had a bit more time, I think I could get used to this.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach admires their new mind flayer form. NodeContext: Good spirited

43.speaker: Player
43.text: No, Karlach. This is for me to do. I'll embrace the parasite - I'll evolve.

12.speaker: Karlach
12.text: I know you. I know you know your own mind. If this is what you want, then all I can say is give 'em Hell, soldier.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: No - neither of us is turning into a mind flayer. Not now.

66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player closes their eyes, a mindmeld effect takes over. Player transforms into a mind flayer. See: END_IllithidOptions_Assimilation for animation of the same moment.

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *Your pulse quickens through veins, nerves, thoughts, rising to a fever pitch.*

19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player transforms into a mind flayer

28.speaker: Narrator
28.text: *Your mind and body swell as one. You are who you always were, but infinitely better.*
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player admires their new mind flayer form.

68.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
68.text: What are you doing? You cannot wield the Netherstones if you are not a mind flayer.

37.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
37.text: This might be your last opportunity to evolve - do it. Now.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: Karlach, if you really want to do this, all I can say is 'thank you.'

13.speaker: Orpheus
13.text: Is'tark. You are putting us at risk!

57.speaker: Orpheus
57.text: What are you waiting for? You cannot wield the Netherstones unless you become a mind flayer.

41.speaker: Orpheus
41.text: Do the honourable thing - make the sacrifice. Now.

55.speaker: Narrator
55.text: *A fierce thing, burning with potential - it feels your burden, your strife. It wants to evolve you.*

29.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
29.text: Do it. Do it now. Evolve.

9.speaker: Orpheus
9.text: Gith'ka tavkim krash'ht. Your sacrifice will not be forgotten.

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *A gentle thing, full of promise, full of potential. It wants to evolve you.*

61.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
61.text: Go on - open your mind to it. Complete your evolution. Become illithid.

26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companion hands the player the tadpole the supreme tadpole from their inventory. This can be off-screen. it's an edge case.InternalNodeContext: This is if a companion is the one who used the tadpole.
